org.apache.hama.ipc

Interface HamaRPCProtocolVersion

  • All Superinterfaces:
    VersionedProtocol
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BSPPeerProtocol, GroomProtocol, HamaMessageManager<M>, JobSubmissionProtocol, MasterProtocol
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BSPMaster, GroomServer, HamaAsyncMessageManagerImpl, HamaMessageManagerImpl, LocalBSPRunner, LocalBSPRunner.LocalUmbilical

    public interface HamaRPCProtocolVersion
extends VersionedProtocol
    There is one version id for all the RPC interfaces. If any interface is changed, the versionID must be changed here.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long versionID
